orego.experiment

Class Debug

  • java.lang.Object
    • orego.experiment.Debug

  • public class Debug
extends Object
    This class provides static methods for sending debug messages to a graphic window or to a file. (Such messages cannot be sent to stdout as it would confuse GTP.)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String OREGO_ROOT_DIRECTORY
      The root directory for Orego.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Debug() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void debug(Object s)
      Prints s (and a newline) to the static instance of DebugFrame if the debug frame is enabled.
      static void setDebugFile(String filename)
      Specify debug logging to a file.
      static void setDebugToStderr(boolean value)
      Indicate whether debugging messages are sent to stderr.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • OREGO_ROOT_DIRECTORY

        public static final String OREGO_ROOT_DIRECTORY
        The root directory for Orego. Code and data are in subdirectories of this.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Debug

        public Debug()

    • Method Detail

      • debug

        public static void debug(Object s)
        Prints s (and a newline) to the static instance of DebugFrame if the debug frame is enabled. Also prints s (and a newline) to debugFile if the debug file is enabled.

      • setDebugFile

        public static void setDebugFile(String filename)
        Specify debug logging to a file. If filename is null, turn off file logging.
        Parameters:
        filename - full pathname to the file.

      • setDebugToStderr

        public static void setDebugToStderr(boolean value)
        Indicate whether debugging messages are sent to stderr.
